job.title: Machine Learning Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Job Description     - 100% REMOTE***      
We're looking for a Machine Learning Data Engineer with an affinity for machine learning infrastructure and model development. Excellent opportunity to work for a leading eCommerce organization in a role with full remote flexibility!      Responsibilities Of The Machine Learning Data Engineer        - Prototype and research ML features   
  - Drive ML solutions in Spark and Tensorflow to production   
  - Present and communicate internally and externally   
  - Participate in continuous improvement of team's engineering processes and infrastructure   
  - Mentor and coach junior engineers and participate in code and design reviews   
 Requirements of the Machine Learning Data Engineer:     - Demonstrated ability to analyze large data sets and identify gaps   
  - Ability to design and deploy solutions in a Hadoop environment   
  - Proficiency in Java and Linux environments   
  - Basic ML knowledge      
Keywords: Data Engineer, Machine Learning, ML, Spark, Tensorflow, eCommerce, 100% Remote      Job ID: 352986
